text: I've never been the biggest Battletoads fan simply because of how hard these games were, but I still played all of them. Definitely a mix of fun and frustration, these games! If I had to choose, I'm a bigger fan of the Double Dragon franchise. We all know how David Wise pulled some magic with the DKC games, but this other SNES soundtrack he composed is also awesome. Take the calm 0:28 part for example, that's the David Wise touch.
author: SupraDarky

text: I'm glad I got a supaboy s to play this again been 20yrs

text: how do you make this sound in a 16 bit console? pure magic

text: Easily in my top 5 SNES soundtracks. It kicks so much ass. I remember when I was 5 years old playing this game for the first time. I actually played the entire first stage rocking out to this song. Well done Mr. Wise.

text: this whole soundtrack kicks ass. especially Roper's in level 3. great co-op game and tons of good memories with this game.

text: I love the music from the Battletoads series.  This is probably my favorite stage theme in the game.  I haven't beaten the original Battletoads since I always get stuck at Klinger Winger even with infinite lives.
